pages.text: $(li)Elephants are neutral creatures that spawns in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savvannas$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)These creatures can be attracted with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/acacia_blossom)Acacia Blossom$(/l).$(br)$(li)Elephants can be tamed with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/acacia_blossom)Acacia Blossom$(/l) too, but only non-tusker adults can be tamed. However, baby Tusker Elephants can be tamed too.
$(li)Tamed Elephants will defend their owner but they will not follow them.$(br)$(li)Elephants are scared of $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bee)Bees$(/l).
$(li)Tamed Elephants can be ridden, without a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) by right-clicking on them.
$(li)Elephants can be equipped with carpets of different colours.
$(li)They can be equipped with $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chests$(/l) for a large 9x6 storage space.
